password.label: Password
password.invalid: Can contain only numbers, uppercase, lowercase and special case characters !@#$%
password.strength: Should contain number, uppercase, lowercase and special case character !@#$%
password.min8: Can not be shorter than 8 characters
password.max20: Can not be longer than 20 characters

username.label: Username
username.invalid: Can contain only numbers, uppercase and lowercase characters
username.min5: Can not be shorter than 5 characters
username.max20: Can not be longer than 20 characters
